BadgeDetail.Name: Fabrication I
BadgeDetail.Description: Employer: This badge demonstrates the earner understands the fundamentals of the fabrication. It demonstrates they are able to accurately measure and mark out, use a hack saw, tap and die. It shows they are able to read a technical drawing, produce a good finish, cut accurate lines and produce square edges.

Task.Title: Mark out and drill
Task.Body: Upload evidence accurately measuring and mark out and using a hack saw, drill, tap and die.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence accurately measuring and mark out and using a hack saw, drill, tap and die.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence accurately measuring and mark out and using a hack saw, drill, tap and die.

Task.Title: Clean lines and edges
Task.Body: Upload evidence reading a technical drawing, producing a good finish and cutting accurate lines and produce square edges.
Task.HtmlBody: Upload evidence reading a technical drawing, producing a good finish and cutting accurate lines and produce square edges.
Task.TextileBody: Upload evidence reading a technical drawing, producing a good finish and cutting accurate lines and produce square edges.
